__e: Your mom had a couple of boyfriends before Albert, and those ended badly, too, huh?
You don't have friends. You have Albert, and you don't get all "me, too" with him.
One for me, one for the wife, one for Albert, and one for luck.
Yeah, and I never wanted to kick Albert Einstein in the nuts.
None of us would even be here if Frank hadn't convinced Albert Einstein we needed a bomb.
You have exactly the same number of hours in the day That Albert Einstein had.
Monsieur Albert, what you did wasn't very nice
I'm sorry, Albert. You don't mean what you're saying.
Albert you don't have to be anything but who you are.
It isn't a chap at all. No, it's the real hall.
Or do I have to go to Albert Hall myself?
Albert, you've been saying "not now" for ten years.
- Why the hell's Albert sitting all alone?
Albert walked home from school on his own today.
Please, Albert. Tell me what happened!
Why did Albert want to see you in his office?
Albert, I'm just telling you what he said to me.
